SEARCH
Package com.xebisco.yield.physics

Klasse Collider

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.ComponentBehavior
com.xebisco.yield.physics.Collider
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Behavior, DefaultAxis, Disposable, Renderable
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
CircleCollider, EdgeCollider, RectangleCollider, TriangleCollider
public abstract class Collider extends ComponentBehavior
The abstract class Collider defines properties and methods for objects that can collide with other objects in a game or simulation.

  • Feldübersicht

  • Methodendetails

    • getShape

      public abstract org.jbox2d.collision.shapes.Shape getShape()
      This function returns a Shape object and is declared as abstract. This shape will be used in PhysicsBodies when creating its bodies fixtures in Box2D.
      Gibt zurück:
      An abstract Shape object is being returned.

    • getDensity

      public double getDensity()
      The function returns the value of the density variable as a double.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning a double value, which is the value of the variable "density".

    • setDensity

      public void setDensity(double density)
      This function sets the density value of an object.
      Parameter:
      density - The parameter "density" is a double data type that represents the density of a fixture. The method "setDensity" sets the value of the density variable to the value passed as an argument to the method.

    • getFriction

      public double getFriction()
      The function returns the value of the friction.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning a double value which represents the friction.

    • setFriction

      public void setFriction(double friction)
      This function sets the friction value of an object.
      Parameter:
      friction - The "friction" parameter is a double data type that represents the amount of resistance between two surfaces in contact with each other. This value will be used to determine how much an object will slow down or stop when it comes into contact with another object or surface.

    • isSensor

      public boolean isSensor()
      The function returns a boolean value indicating whether the collider is a sensor or not.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method `isSensor()` is returning a boolean value, which indicates whether the object is a sensor or not. The value returned will be `true` if the object is a sensor, and `false` otherwise.

    • setSensor

      public void setSensor(boolean sensor)
      The function sets the value of a boolean variable called "sensor".
      Parameter:
      sensor - The "sensor" parameter is a boolean variable that represents whether a collider is a sensor or not.

    • getCollisionFilter

      public Set<String> getCollisionFilter()
      The function returns a set of Strings representing a collision filter.
      Gibt zurück:
      A Set of Strings named "collisionFilter" is being returned.

    • setCollisionFilter

      public void setCollisionFilter(Set<String> collisionFilter)
      This function sets the collision filter for an object.
      Parameter:
      collisionFilter - The parameter "collisionFilter" is a Set of Strings that is used to filter collisions. It contains the IDs of the objects that should be checked for collisions. Objects with IDs that are present in the collisionFilter will be ignored in collisions.

    • getCollisionMask

      public String getCollisionMask()
      The function returns the collision mask as a String value.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning a String value which represents the collision mask.

    • setCollisionMask

      public void setCollisionMask(String collisionMask)
      This function sets the collision mask of an object.
      Parameter:
      collisionMask - The collisionMask parameter is a String value that represents the ID of this collider when colliding with other objects.

    • setIgnoreScaling
